sentences.en: Add 20μ l PAM solution into some whole by the designed scheme.
sentences.cn: 将预先升至室温的PAM溶液按照20μl的设计加入到各组细胞培养孔中.

sentences.en: Adding PAM along with collector can accelerate the air flotation speed and achieve better effluent quality.
sentences.cn: 捕收剂与聚丙烯酰胺(PAM)配合使用可以提高气浮速度和出水水质.

sentences.en: Agglomeration of fine particles is restrained by acid , which may curl the molecular chains of PAM.
sentences.cn: 磷酸使得PAM分子链发生卷曲,对细颗粒团聚有抑制作用.

sentences.en: Before Pam made the cake she read the directions on the packet.
sentences.cn: 帕姆在做糕点之前看了一遍小包上的说明.

sentences.en: Henry said through the car window, " Goodbye, Pam . Happy landings. "
sentences.cn: 享利隔着车窗说: “ 再见, 帕姆. 一路顺风. ”

sentences.en: Infra spectrum and UV spectrum analysis showed that rigid PAM molecules formed in PA 6.
sentences.cn: 红外光谱、紫外光谱分析表明了刚性链高分子PAM在 PA6中已经生成.

sentences.en: Jaws all on the floor like Pam, like Tommy just burst in the door.
sentences.cn: 下颚都掉到了地板上, 就像Pam和Tommy刚刚闯进房间.

sentences.en: JYZZ flocculant adding system is automatic mechanical equipment that can make polymer solution from PAM powder.
sentences.cn: JYZZ系列絮凝剂投配装置是一种将PAM粉剂投配成溶液的自动机械装置.

sentences.en: Oh Pam, can you come over here for a minute?
sentences.cn: 喂,帕姆, 你能来一下 吗 ?

sentences.en: Pam had never learned that there were men who preyed on young runaways.
sentences.cn: 帕姆从来不知道有人专门坑骗离家出走的年轻人。

sentences.en: Pam made the dress by hand.
sentences.cn: 帕姆用手工缝了这件衣服.

sentences.en: Pam was in the middle of basting the turkey.
sentences.cn: 帕姆正在往烤鸡上淋油。

sentences.en: Separating polyacrylamide ( PAM ) and acrylamide ( AM ) by Soxhlet and convenient on operating.
sentences.cn: 利用索氏提取法分离聚丙烯酰胺 ( PAM ) 与丙烯酰胺 ( AM ).

trans.tran_cn: pamphlet 小册子，primary amoebic meningoence phalitis 原发性阿米巴性脑膜炎，payload assist module 有效载荷帮助模块，pulse amplified modulation 脉冲放大调谐波幅调制
